localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Crowdfunded provides a database with extensive data on 2,000+ crowdfunding campaigns. You can use it to understand customer demand, discover successful product categories, see what competitors are launching, and find promising product ideas.
blogPost.body: Crowdfunded provides a database with extensive data on 2,000+ crowdfunding campaigns. You can use it to understand customer demand, discover successful product categories, see what competitors are launching, and find promising product ideas.
blogPost.title: Crowdfunded - A database of 2,000+ crowdfunding campaigns
blogPost.author: Marco Spoerl

localize.description: 众筹提供了一个数据库，其中包含2000多个众筹活动的大量数据。您可以使用它来了解客户需求、发现成功的产品类别、查看竞争对手正在推出的产品，以及找到有前途的产品想法。
localize.tagline: 包含2000多个众筹活动的数据库

localize.description: 衆籌提供了一個數據庫，其中包含2000多個衆籌活動的大量數據。您可以使用它來了解客戶需求、發現成功的產品類別、查看競爭對手正在推出的產品，以及找到有前途的產品想法。
localize.tagline: 包含2000多個衆籌活動的數據庫

previous.excerpt: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!
previous.title: Planmesh - The easiest way to plan with friends

localize.description: 计划您喜欢的事情，与您的朋友在线和亲自做。与朋友一起制定计划，分享计划，看看其他人在做什么，并跟踪即将到来的活动。计划聚餐、早午餐、学习课程、下一次约会，你说的都可以。
localize.tagline: 最简单的和朋友一起计划的方法

localize.description: 計劃您喜歡的事情，與您的朋友在線和親自做。與朋友一起制定計劃，分享計劃，看看其他人在做什麼，並跟蹤即將到來的活動。計劃聚餐、早午餐、學習課程、下一次約會，你說的都可以。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的和朋友一起計劃的方法

next.title: A week ago, the $VIX saw its 3rd largest single-day spike in history (+62%). All of that increase has been erased as of today's close with volatility moving sharply lower. https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo

localize.full_text: 一周前，美元VIX指数出现了历史上第3大单日飙升（+62%）。截至今日收盘，所有的涨幅都被抹去，波动率大幅走低。https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo。
一週前，美元VIX指數出現了歷史上第3大單日飆升（+62%）。截至今日收盤，所有的漲幅都被抹去，波動率大幅走低。https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo。
